strapiPost.title: Juniper Hill Opens Holiday Pop Up Shop At Promenade Mall In Rogers
strapiPost.content:
More than just a one-stop-shop for all your Christmas needs, Juniper Hill Home turns shopping into a Christmas Experience. 

  • Holiday cheer: Find the perfect decor for your holiday season while sipping mulled cider, and donâ€™t be afraid to bring the kids! They can enjoy Christmas story time while you shop. 
  • In the workshop: Check out Juniper Hill's great class opportunities like cookie baking, wreath classes, charcuterie workshops, and more. 

Learn more about Juniper Hill Home HERE.
